originalText.text: Although I wish there was an online option to do this visa process, I must say the girls there made it easy. All very helpful and kind. I don't want to return, but if I had to I would because their customer service was awesome.

text.text: Although I wish there was an online option to do this visa process, I must say the girls there made it easy. All very helpful and kind. I don't want to return, but if I had to I would because their customer service was awesome.

originalText.text: This place honestly deserve 0 stars. Not even for the way they treated me, but they way they treated others who came for their services. I have never experienced such unprofessionalism in my life and this was my 3rd time applying for a Nigerian visa. There was no order in the office, regardless if you have an appointment or not. I was there for a 10am appointment and was addressed until 12:30pm. I had to go up and down to FedEX so many times, I cannot count. Instead of instructing persons once and clearly, it was as if they found joy in you going in and out the office. The website does not detail all you'll need for your appointment. So much was unclear. It was truly a disappointing experience; especially being that some persons have to drive from very far to visit their official, there should be more professionalism and more consideration taken.

originalText.text: My experience with you all on August 18th, 2023 was lovely, a blessing compared to the one in Washington, DC. Miss Candi, Miss FeFe and there was another young lady there was all patient, polite, and understanding with me. Miss Candi was knowledgeable about her job and helped me out a lot with the completion of the application process. I told them all, that I traveled far distance to get here and that I would do it all again because of how nice, helpful, and honest they was to me. You all have a great team at this place! â€¦.They didnâ€™t know how my night, morning, and the day went before getting to my appointmentâ€¦So, thanks again ladies for all that you did and for the upbeat energy you all had on that day to make me smile..I prayed for you all and gave thanks to the Lord for a great experience. Keep it up ladies ðŸ¤—..Much love. I will visit NY, NY City again.

originalText.text:
The location is 370 Lexington Ave.
Was a great experience. The girls there are all very kind and EXTREMELY helpful. Got all my questions answered and got my visa very quickly!

originalText.text: whoever owns this establishment is making beacoup money and yet providing the most incompetent service. sad, because there is no other place to get this done and so you are forced to deal with it. we can do better as a people. we really can
